form.title: Sign in
form.description: Create an account and sign in to keep your data saved and synchronized on the server

form.title: Sign up
form.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

about.title: Sparkpad
about.description: Sparkpad is a free and open-source note-taking application designed to help you organize your thoughts, ideas, and tasks efficiently. With a user-friendly interface and powerful features, Sparkpad makes it easy to capture and manage your notes on the go.
about.author: Misha Grebennikov
